post_detail.description:
Challenge:

After creating a successful Facebook tab for Flirt! Rock-n-Rebel, Estee Lauder's BeautyBank division approached us again to develop a Facebook tab for their new product, All That Lash, featuring Glee's Heather Morris. The goal was to make consumers aware of the new mascara, engage existing fans, acquire new fans and get people to enter a contest in which the winner meets Heather Morris and stars in a Flirt! viral video.

Execution:

CFM created an engaging tab with a fun, flirty design, links to buy the product and a performance-themed quiz..
post_detail.title: Flirt! All That Lash
